name: Face Detection
descr: Detect faces on an image or a video combining results of several methods depending on the models you choose. Two different types of models are available: the ones based on Artificial Neural Networks (ANN) and the other one based on Haar cascade classifiers. Requires an image or a video. Produces an image or a video and an annotated file with coordinates of the detected faces.
